body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Attack with Qasali Pridemage and Defiant Elf What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: no +1/+1 bump from Exalted, since two creatures are attacking
Actual: Defiant Elf gets +1/+1 from Qasali Pridemage What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.24 on WinXP
author: [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/)
title: Qasali Pridemage grants +1/+1 when attacking together with another creature

comments.body:
Thanks for reporting. This was fixed in revision 7f7a85aa7b9d .

**Status:** Duplicate  
  **Mergedinto:** 203
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/) on April 28, 2012 12:07:16_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Attack with Qasali Pridemage and Defiant Elf What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: no +1/+1 bump from Exalted, since two creatures are attacking
Actual: Defiant Elf gets +1/+1 from Qasali Pridemage What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.24 on WinXP

**Attachment:** [qasali-pridemage.PNG game.log](http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=210)

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=210_
